dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.search_placeholder: Search by URL or short code...
dashboard.no_links_description: Create your first shortened link to get started. Click the button above to begin.
dashboard.no_results_description: No links match your search. Try a different search term.

form.create_description: Create a new shortened link by entering the URL and a custom short code.
form.original_url_description: The full URL you want to shorten
form.short_code_description: A unique code for your shortened link

confirm.delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete this link? This action cannot be undone.

validation.shortcode_min: Short code must be at least 3 characters
validation.shortcode_max: Short code must be less than 50 characters
validation.shortcode_format: Short code can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores

hero.description: Transform long, complex URLs into short, memorable links. Track performance, manage your links, and grow your online presence with our powerful link shortener.

features.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features.description: Powerful features designed to help you manage and optimize your links effectively.
features.feature1_desc: Convert long URLs into short, shareable links in seconds. Perfect for social media, emails, and anywhere space matters.
features.feature2_desc: Track clicks, understand your audience, and measure the impact of your links with detailed analytics and reporting.
features.feature3_desc: Built with modern technology for blazing-fast performance. Your links work instantly, every time.
features.feature4_desc: Enterprise-grade security ensures your links are safe. SSL encryption and 99.9% uptime guarantee.
features.feature5_desc: Use your own domain for branded short links. Build trust and reinforce your brand identity.
features.feature6_desc: Organize, edit, and manage all your links from one intuitive dashboard. Find what you need, when you need it.

how_it_works.title: Simple, Fast, Effective
how_it_works.description: Get started in three easy steps and start sharing your short links immediately.
how_it_works.step1_desc: Create your free account in seconds. No credit card required.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Paste your long URL and get a short link instantly. Customize it if you want.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Share your link anywhere and monitor its performance with real-time analytics.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who trust our platform to manage their links. Start shortening your URLs for free today.
